name: Price Feed Bot
description: This Bot Emulates The Chainlink PriceFeed Contract, Which Publishes Price Updates For ETH And Other Cryptocurrencies Using External Price Feeds At A Regular Interval. This Bot Produces A Heartbeat That Many Other Systems Rely On.

name: Liquidator Bot
description: This Bot Searches For Bad Loans On The Compound V2 Protocol And Liquidates Them, Ensuring That The Protocol Stays Well-Capitalized And Healthy. This Bot Will Keep An Even Inventory Of Funds By Swapping Through Uniswap.
